subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] response to the sceptic link on my images

Everyone,
 
 
This took place about a year ago the guy stole my images fro=
m IAH and put up this page in one day.
He was immediately put down and disc=
redited and never surfaced again.
The images where there for everyone to sc=
rutinize and they were posted on almost a daily basis for a while.
It's lik=
e anything else in the paranormal, there will always be self appointed so c=
alled seekers of truth.
 
If you notice mine is the only item on the whole =
site. I don't mind sceptics or questioning about how I got these images 
bu=
t this guy was an idiot. If he just would have asked, I would have explaine=
d what process I went through to bring 
the images out of the glare of the =
sunlight. As a matter of fact I had done a whole step by step instruction p=
age on my previous website about the process. This creep was a self proclai=
med photoshop expert and claimed my images were touched up.
So I gave him a=
 raw image of mine and asked him to come up with the same result. That was =
the last I heard from him.
 
I did not put these images up to have to defen=
d them, I just thought because of the interest that arose regarding Margare=
t's images 
reminded me of my itc days, which are now long gone. My only in=
terest is box research.
 
I don't feel it was necessary to did up that idio=
ts website and post the link with my IAH gallery, I did not post these pict=
ures 
to prove anything just for curiosity sake.
 
Bruce
 
Bruce Halliday 
=

ch > with every method of ITC imaging.> > I did Video Loop, water reflectio=
n, crystal, mirror, you name it.> And got pretty good results from most.> >=
 My most astounding visual itc came from a dicovery in my home.> I have a c=
rystal window in the front door of my house facing west, > when the sun sta=
rts to go down it shines through this crystal window > and projects onto th=
e walls in my family room.> > I was sitting watching tv one day and happenn=
ed to look over at > something that caught my attention, when I looked over=
 there was a > face looking back. I ran to get my digital camera and that s=
tarted a > year long process of experiments and spirit images I name VPI (v=
isual > projection imaging) I have literally hundreds of detailed images of=
 > spirits that where reflected through the crystal onto the walls in my > =
home. as far as I can discern the spirits were forming the images > inside =
of the crystal window, and the sun was acting as sort of a > slide or movie=
 projecter. Projecting their images onto the walls when > it came through t=
he window.> > I had a page on I am haunted for the longest time, and drew q=
uite a > following for my images. Alas since I discovered box research I ha=
ve > not done one imaging session.> > What got my attention was the mention=
 of the horse image. I also > captured the image of a horse, very detailed =
and a cat that you would > think was sitting right in the room.> > Maragare=
t, please post the link to your site I did not get it and I > would love to=
 take a look.> > If anyone is interested let me know and I'll post some of =
my images.> > Bruce>

Everyone,<BR>
 <BR>
 <BR>
This took place about a yea=
r ago the guy stole my images from IAH and put up this page in one day=
.<BR>
He was immediately put down and discredited and never surfaced again.=
<BR>
The images where there for everyone to scrutinize and they were posted=
 on almost a daily basis for a while.<BR>
It's like anything else in the pa=
ranormal, there will always be self appointed so called seekers of truth.<B=
R>
 <BR>
If you notice mine is the only item on the whole site. I don'=
t mind sceptics or questioning about how I got these images <BR>
but this g=
uy was an idiot. If he just would have asked, I would have explained what p=
rocess I went through to bring <BR>
the images out of the glare of the sunl=
ight. As a matter of fact I had done a whole step by step instruction page =
on my <BR>previous website about the process. This creep was a self proclai=
med photoshop expert and claimed my images were touched up.<BR>
So I gave h=
im a raw image of mine and asked him to come up with the same result. That =
was the last I heard from him.<BR>
 <BR>
I did not put these images up=
 to have to defend them, I just thought because of the interest that arose =
regarding Margaret's images <BR>
reminded me of my itc days, which are now =
long gone. My only interest is box research.<BR>
 <BR>
I don't feel it=

gallery, I did not post these pictures <BR>

osity sake.<BR>

Bruce<BR>
